Hash It! eases using unique passwords per web site without overloading your brain. It is compatible with the hashing algorithm used by the Password Hasher Firefox extension. 
 
Further Information / Changelog

Welcome to Hash It! 
 
Hash It! eases using unique passwords per web site without overloading your brain by generating site-specific passwords derived from a secret Master Key. You will only have to remember a single or few Master Keys whereas Hash It! will make sure that no two web sites will use the same password. 
 
What's New? 

Improved "Welcome" dialog usability 
 
Usage 
From the Browser application, just choose "Share Page" from the menu and select the "Hash It!" entry from the list. After calculating the Hash Word, the password will have been placed on the clipboard. Just hit the back button to return to the web site and paste the clipboard to the password entry field. 
 
Compatibility 
Hash It! is designed to be compatible with the hashing algorithm used by the Password Hasher Firefox extension and supports the "Private Key" feature from the Password Hasher Plus extension for Google Chrome. 
 
Further Information / Changelog 
http://android.ginkel.com/
保存使用过的站点标识.
需要 Android 1.6 以上版本.
清除使用过的站点标识.
Hash 密码后自动返回浏览器 (仅通过浏览器调用时有效).
兼容 Firefox扩展 Password Hasher.
注意: 更改将使以前生成的密码无效.
你选择禁止兼容模式. 本软件将只兼容 Google Chrome 的 Password Hasher Plus 扩展, 并且不 兼容 Firefox 扩展 Password Hasher.\n\n请确认您的所有设备上使用了相同的私钥.
兼容模式已启用,请到设置中关闭.
